infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: TrailRun needs location access to track your running routes and record GPS data during your trail runs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TrailRun needs location access to track your running routes and record GPS data during your trail runs.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: TrailRun needs background location access to continue tracking your route even when the app is not in the foreground.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TrailRun needs camera access to capture photos during your trail runs and geotag them with your current location.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TrailRun needs photo library access to save captured photos and access existing photos for your trail activities.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: TrailRun needs permission to save photos you capture during trail runs to your photo library.
